meanings.definition: You - used to refer to the person or people being addressed
meanings.sent1: Can yu please pass the salt?
meanings.sent3: Yu make me smile every day.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of people, yu shine the brightest.
meanings.sent5: When yu smile, the whole world lights up.

meanings.sent1: My friend's last name is Yu.
meanings.sent2: Yu is a common surname in China.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if Mr. Yu is related to Bruce Lee.
meanings.sent4: The name Yu carries a sense of tradition and honor.
meanings.sent5: When I hear the name Yu, I think of strength and resilience.

meanings.sent1: I caught a Yu while fishing yesterday.
meanings.sent2: Yu is known for its delicate flavor.
meanings.sent3: I can't wait to cook the Yu I caught.
meanings.sent4: The Yu swam gracefully in the clear water.
meanings.sent5: The Yu's scales shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Yu - a unit of measurement in ancient China, equivalent to 3.75 kilograms
meanings.sent1: Back in ancient China, yu was used to measure weight.
meanings.sent2: The merchant traded goods by the yu.
meanings.sent3: I wish we still used yu as a unit of measurement.
meanings.sent4: The yu was a symbol of balance and precision.
meanings.sent5: The yu represented harmony in ancient Chinese trade.
